citations.narrative:
At the petting zoo, in a pen adjacent to the main exhibition enclosure, there was a tub, partially filled with water, with a
moderate to heavy accumulation of dirt and debris present. The facility representative stated the animals do not always
have access to this smaller pen and the receptacle should have been emptied and cleaned. Although there was potable
water available in the main exhibition pen, at time of inspection, the sheep and goats were observed grazing in the
smaller pen. with access to the receptacle.
The presence of a soiled water receptacle and standing water may pose a health hazard to animals. For the health of the
animals, all water receptacles shall be kept clean and sanitary.
Corrected at time of inspection
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
